name: AGENTS OF TOAST
description:
2.5D Top Down Shooter student project. 2019================================================================

AGENT BREAD

THINGS HAVE GONE A-RYE AND WE HAVE RECEIVED REPORTS OF ALIEN TOASTERS RUNNING RAMPANT IN THE CITY!

YOUR MISSION, SHOULD YOU CHOOSE TO ACCEPT IT, IS TO CLEAR OUT THE CITY AND INVESTIGATE THE LAIR OF THESE CRUMBY CREATURES AND DE-WHEAT THEM.

GO GET THAT BREAD.

================================================================
CREDITS:

Programming/3D Modelling/Animation/Level Design/Design & Story -Jason Tam

Programming/Character Design/Level Design/Design & Story -Kate Winsley
